params.title: Parameters
params.introduction: This calculator allows you to create your mix of oils and fats and automatically calculate necesary lye and fragrance quantities.
params.beware: Please wear gloves and protection glasses when you manipulate lye and fresh soap ! Skin contact could harm your skin
params.heading: Oils mix

info.overfat: Overfat ensures you get a neutral pH at the end of the process. It must be within 5 to 9% overfat.
info.fragrance: Soap contains generally around 1-2% fragrances. Too much fragrance could harm your skin.
